sqlGroup.name: deviceData
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT mdd.id, mci.car_no, mci.terminal, mci.car_no_color, mci.car_flag, mci.car_model, mci.car_framework_no, mdd.device_id, mdd.urea_temperature, mdd.urea_position, mdd.temperature_1, mdd.temperature_2, mdd.temperature_3, mdd.temperature_4, mdd.report_time, mdd.pressure, mdd.obd, mdd.`after_km`, mdd.speed, mdd.flag_mileage, mdd.flag_speed, mdd.`dpf_before_temperature`, mdd.`dpf_arter_temperature`, mdd.temperature_1_flag, mdd.urea_temperature_flag, mdd.urea_position_flag, mdd.temperature_2_flag, mdd.temperature_3_flag, mdd.temperature_4_flag, mdd.pressure_flag, mdd.pm_value, mdd.no_value, mdd.pm_value_flag, mdd.no_value_flag, mcg.baidu_latitude, mcg.baidu_longitude, mdd.code errorcode, divi.device_code , (SELECT if(car_status IS NULL, 0, car_status) status FROM mo_device_status mds WHERE mds.device_id = mdd.device_id) status -- @where FROM mo_device_data mdd inner join mo_device divi ON divi.id = mdd.device_id LEFT JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.device_id = mdd.device_id LEFT JOIN mo_car_gps mcg ON mcg.id = mdd.gps_id and mcg.baidu_latitude >= 1 AND mcg.baidu_longitude >= 1 LEFT JOIN mo_driver md ON md.id = mci.driver_id -- @condition WHERE mci.id IS NOT NULL

SELECT mdd.`id`, mdd.`device_id`, mdd.`fwh_version`, mdd.`software_version`, mdd.`obd`, mdd.`after_km`, mdd.`speed`, mdd.`engine_speed`, mdd.`torque`, mdd.`nox`, mdd.`curon`, mdd.`engine_load`, mdd.`dpf_before_temperature`, mdd.`dpf_arter_temperature`, mdd.`urea_temperature`, mdd.`urea_position`, mdd.`temperature_1`, mdd.`temperature_2`, mdd.`temperature_3`, mdd.`temperature_4`, mdd.`pressure`, mdd.`report_time`, mdd.`flag_mileage`, mdd.`flag_speed`, mdd.`temperature_1_flag`, mdd.`urea_temperature_flag`, mdd.`urea_position_flag`, mdd.`temperature_2_flag`, mdd.`temperature_3_flag`, mdd.`temperature_4_flag`, mdd.`pressure_flag`, mci.car_no, md.name car_color_name, mcg.baidu_latitude, mcg.baidu_longitude, mdd.code errorcode, divi.device_code , (SELECT if(car_status IS NULL, 0, car_status) status FROM mo_device_status mds WHERE mds.device_id = mdd.device_id) status FROM mo_device_data mdd inner join mo_device divi ON divi.id = mdd.device_id LEFT JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.device_id = mdd.device_id LEFT JOIN mo_dict md ON mci.car_no_color = md.code AND md.parent = 21 LEFT JOIN mo_car_gps mcg ON mcg.id = mdd.gps_id and mcg.baidu_latitude >= 1 AND mcg.baidu_longitude >= 1 WHERE mci.id = ? LIMIT 1
SELECT dd.* FROM mo_device_data dd INNER JOIN mo_device d ON d.id = dd.device_id WHERE d.device_code = ? ORDER BY dd.report_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT dd.* FROM mo_device_data dd WHERE dd.device_id = ? ORDER BY dd.report_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT mdd.id, mci.car_no, mci.terminal, mci.car_no_color, mci.car_flag, mci.car_model, mci.car_framework_no, mdd.device_id, mdd.urea_temperature, mdd.urea_position, mdd.temperature_1, mdd.temperature_2, mdd.temperature_3, mdd.temperature_4, mdd.report_time, mdd.pressure, mdd.obd, mdd.speed, mdd.flag_mileage, mdd.flag_speed, mdd.`dpf_before_temperature`, mdd.`dpf_arter_temperature`, mdd.temperature_1_flag, mdd.urea_temperature_flag, mdd.urea_position_flag, mdd.temperature_2_flag, mdd.temperature_3_flag, mdd.temperature_4_flag, mdd.pressure_flag, mdd.pm_value, mdd.no_value, mdd.pm_value_flag, mdd.no_value_flag, mcg.baidu_latitude, mcg.baidu_longitude, mdd.code errorcode, divi.device_code , (SELECT if(car_status IS NULL, 0, car_status) status FROM mo_device_status mds WHERE mds.device_id = mdd.device_id) status -- @where FROM mo_device_data mdd inner join mo_device divi ON divi.id = mdd.device_id LEFT JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.device_id = mdd.device_id LEFT JOIN mo_car_gps mcg ON mcg.id = mdd.gps_id and mcg.baidu_latitude >= 1 AND mcg.baidu_longitude >= 1 LEFT JOIN mo_driver md ON md.id = mci.driver_id -- @condition WHERE mdd.id = ? LIMIT 1
